metadata.title: CVE-2018-19762 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap-based buffer overflow at fromsixel.c (function:image_buffer_resize) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial of serviceor possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
